name: Nuclear Rain (aznoqmous)
description:
Here is my attempt to create a crossover between Nuclear Throne and Risk of Rain, two of my favourite games.

In Nuclear Rain you will run through procedurally generated levels, stack lot of upgrades, wield a variety of deadly weapons and watch out for your HPs and Ammos !

I wanted to test out Electron performances so everything here is pure ES6 javascript with no game engine nor libraries.

Keep in mind this is a early development build as you might encounter some bugs.

Let me hear in the comments if you like the idea !
